title: Modern 4 bed townhouse in Fairmount with historic charm
description:
Luxury 4 bed, 2.5 bath townhouse in Fairmount. Enjoy walking home to a stately townhouse greeted by a cherry blossom. Enjoy an elegant dinner on the two-story wood deck with views of the city, Fairmount park, and Benjamin Franklin bridge. The house was fully renovated in 2017 but retains it original charm with stain-glass entry, original tiled vestibule with french doors, plantation shutters, original handcrafted and ornate wood built-in vanity, and detailed sage paneling in the nursery. Modern amenities include granite countertops, stainless steel Jenn-air appliances, 2nd floor washer/drier, first floor bathroom, two sinks and two shower heads in master bath, as well as state-of-the-art utilities and partially finished basement.
Enjoy being 3 blocks from Fairmount Ave restaurants and Corinthian Gardens, 1 block from a playground, across the street from Bach Martin elementary school, and walking distance to whole foods, the Barnes, Philadelphia Museum of Art, Boathouse Row, Lemon Hill, and multiple coffee shops. Ideal for young families. Inquire for inside pictures. Neighbors on this block have lived here for 50+ years. Easy permit-less parking in front due to the school across the street. Active family social groups and very friendly neighbors.

landlord tenant filings or evictions. In addition, you cannot have an arrest
record. Your income needs to be at least two - three times the cost of rent.

description:
This newly renovated property is a 4 bedroom, 2 bathroom gem perfectly located near Temple University that's ready for you to move in immediately. With central heat and air, you'll be comfortable all year round, and the free wifi included in your rent means you'll always be connected. The modern finishes and appliances will make you feel right at home, and the washer and dryer in-unit provide ultimate convenience. This unit comes with a private backyard for summer BBQs. You'll love the location of this property, as it's surrounded by public transportation options, making it easy to get around and explore all the city has to offer. The first month, last month and security deposit (1 month's rent) are due by move-in. Send me an email to schedule a tour and I'll try to respond within 2 hours.

description:
Very large 3 bedroom apartment with 2 full bathrooms for rent in Center City Philadelphia.

- One large bedroom and full bathroom is on this floor.  On the third floor are two more large bedrooms and a large bathroom.

title: townhouse on quiet street w/ roof deck, courtyard, large master suite
description:
This lovely 3 BR 2 1/2 bath house on a peaceful, tree-lined street in the heart of Washington Square West boasts unique outdoor spaces. A brand-new rooftop deck with privacy fence, and jaw-dropping skyline views. French doors open to a serene brick courtyard off the eat-in kitchen. Having outdoor space in the city is a premium!
There is an exquisite master bedroom suite which includes a private bath on the 3rd floor.
The 3-sided working fireplace is the focal point of the first floor and can be viewed from the living room and dining room.
There is no street parking on this block of Rodman Street, so it is quiet and there is very little traffic. Perfect for a young family.
But that's not all! This gem is conveniently located in the Avenue of the Arts area, just a short walk away from the theaters, Rittenhouse Square, Washington Square and all the fun and excitement on South Street.  Segar playground / dog park and CVS are 1 block away. Whole Foods and Acme are just two blocks away. The best restaurants and bars in Mid-Town Village are very close. Jefferson University is also right in this neighborhood. The University of Pennsylvania and the Schuylkill River walk are just a quick stroll away. Public transportation couldn't be easier with the Broad Street line just 2 blocks away and multiple bus lines running on Lombard and 12th Street.
Secure parking is available ½ block from the house for an additional $200.
Don't miss out on this opportunity to live in the heart of it all. Contact us today to schedule a tour and make this gorgeous house your new home!

title: BEAUTIFUL NEWLY RENOVATED TWO BEDROOMS AT EMERSON APARTMENTS!!
description:
EMERSON APARTMENTS
We are located in the greater northeast section of Philadelphia right off of Bustleton
Avenue with Evarts as the cross street. Our apartments are fully renovated with brand
new kitchens and bathrooms! Parking lot in the rear of the building and laundry facilities on site!
Heat, hot water and cooking gas included!
Don’t miss this opportunity to find the home you will love!

Physical applications are on site.
You may bring along the following so you can apply the same day:
1. The application fee in the form of a money order. The
application fee is $75 for up to two applicants.
*Any adult moving in MUST be on the application.

2. A copy of your social security card and ID is recommended.
In order to qualify for an apartment, your credit report must have no relevant
landlord tenant filings or evictions. In addition, you cannot have an arrest
record. Your income needs to be at least two - three times the cost of rent.

title: Safe, quiet apartment with parking and patio
description:
This unit is a coveted ground-floor, one-bedroom residence that spans across 512 square feet of living space and features sustainable bamboo flooring, an eco-friendly Nest thermostat, and a large covered patio. Additionally, there is one parking space.
The living area boasts 14-foot barrel-shaped ceilings, while the kitchen features shaker-style cabinets, stainless appliance suite, and a cozy breakfast bar. Beyond the kitchen is the bedroom, with shelving and a spacious closet. The bonus loft space serves as a great space to host guests or use as a home office (or use as your bedroom).
$2400 per month + utilities
Pet’s are okay with an additional monthly fee
Tenant pays for gas, electric, cable, and internet
Owner pays for water and trash removal
